模块 com.example.BubbleBobble

程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.Unit

package com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.Unit
  • 类概要
    类
    说明
    CeilingUnit
    class FloorUnit is the unit for the floor (The ground that hero and enemy can jump on in the air)
    FloorUnit
    class FloorUnit is the unit for the floor (The ground that hero and enemy can jump on in the air)
    Unit
    Abstract class for unit The unit abstract class contains three concrete class: Ceiling Unit Floor Unit Wall Unit
    UnitFactory
    Abstract class for unit factory, to create specific unit according to type specified in the CreateUnit(char type, InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum) method.
    WallUnit
    class WallUnit is the unit for the wall (The surrounding and the bound of the interactable world)
